sentences.en: ...the faint bleat of a distressed animal.
sentences.cn: ...一个哀伤的动物发出的微弱呼叫声。

sentences.en: ‘But I’ve only just got here,’ bleated Simon.
sentences.cn: “可是我刚刚才到这里呀。”西蒙抱怨道。

sentences.en: He heard the bleat of a lamb.
He was lifting up the lamb's head, pulling on its muzzle to make it bleat.
sentences.cn: 他正将羔羊的头举起, 拉着它的鼻孔,搞得羔羊咩咩的叫.

sentences.en: She began to cry and bleat fearfully, and the farmer came out to protect the lamb.
sentences.cn: 羊妈妈开始很害怕地咩咩叫起来, 农夫就跑出来保护小羊.

sentences.en: She bleat her disapproval of her son's marriage to Amy.
sentences.cn: 她用颤抖的声音表示不赞成儿子与艾咪的婚事.

sentences.en: She let out a bleat of horror.
The poor goat would bleat in pain until it died.
sentences.cn: 那只可怜的羊痛苦地哀叫着直到死去.

sentences.en: The victim gave a bleat of terror.
sentences.cn: 那个受害者发出一声恐惧的哀鸣.

sentences.en: There came the bleat of horns.
They bleat about how miserable they are.
sentences.cn: 他们诉说他们的生活是多么悲惨.

trans.tran_en: to make the sound that a sheep or goat makes

trans.tran_cn: （羊，小牛）叫，哭诉，发出羊叫似的声音，轻声诉说
咩咩地发出，以颤抖可怜的声音说出，愚蠢地讲
